Question
========
What is GitHub Desktop used for?

Answerlist
----------
* Hosting repositories in the cloud
* A graphical client to work with Git and GitHub
* Writing and running R code
* Automatically syncing files without commits

Solution
========
GitHub Desktop is a graphical client that lets you commit, pull, and push without the command line.
